website_summaries.verdict: Good support and cushioning make these a great every day shoe, especially if you're on your feet a lot.
pros: Good cushioning makes them great for running or walking even on concrete
Lightweight, breathable mesh helps reduce sweating
cons: Narrow fit doesn't work for wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Not like my previous under armours.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought a pair of a year ago of the same brand shoes. When the tread started wearing off because of all the walking I do, I went online to buy another pair and bought two. When they arrived, I was a bit disappointed. These just feel like playing all generic shoes. My previous under armours felt like I was walking on clouds and we're great for walking. I would probably not by under armours again actually this pair which is a shame because I assumed I had found my most comfortable shoes ever as of this time last year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 10 wide and these shoes are only medium fit. It did gave me a size fit test and the size guide suggested for me to try a 10 1/2. I risk it and the delivery came very quickly. I tried them on as soon as it came. It doesn’t fit too tight, it would if I kept them a size 10. It fits perfect for me. I desperately need workout shoes. My old ones were wearing out!
customer_reviews.author: Viv93

customer_reviews.title: Good arch and foot support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do run on the tighter side. I ordered 1/2 size larger than I normally would. Good arch and foot support. I work all day in a clinic, so I look for shoes that are comfortable and supportive. I usually keep my loyalty to Nike but wanted to try something different, I’m glad I brached out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awsome, versatile shoes for running errends or shift work!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes so much I purchased two pair for myself and a pair for my mom. They are cute, lightweight and super breathable. One pair I use for work, I combine them with compression socks during my 12-hour shifts as a floor nurse. My feet aren't tired at the end of the night and my feet never get sweaty. I do think these fit best for those with narrower feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... usually double the price BUT these have been really comfortable! I have had them for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high expectations for these considering my UA sneakers are usually double the price BUT these have been really comfortable! I have had them for a few months and I wear them every couple of days (They’re in the rotation) and I have really loved the way they feel. I have not tested them out on a long or hard run, but I have actually done a few dance classes in them and they held up. I have bad knees from years of sports, so I’m pretty particular about shoes.
customer_reviews.author: TheUgliestDuckling

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable with great support! It's super hard firnke to find good shows because I have a bad ankle. This is the first time I have bought Under Armour shoes, and it will not be the last!!
customer_reviews.author: JaredAlly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of good shoes as I am on my feet all day at work. I usually always by Nike but the last 2 pair I bought fell apart within 6 months. I decided to try a new brand and these had great reviews. They are really comfortable and they fit perfect. I’m praying they last....I have only had them for about 2 weeks. This will be the brand I buy from now on as long as they don’t fall apart like my others. 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: After just 1 day and I loved them! I got them for a great price. 1st Under Armour shoes I have had and I hope they last. After I received them I thought that maybe there was a little too much white on the sole but I wore them and by the end of the day I just loved the look and feel. They look better in person than the picture!
customer_reviews.author: MN Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box, very little break-in time. Use these for my walk/run HIIT program and my step programs. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: APClark

customer_reviews.title: Like bouncing on clouds
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable pair of running shoes I own now. I bought 2 nike pairs at the same time and these are the most comfortable. It feels like it fully supports your foot and also like little shock absorbers. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Holt

customer_reviews.title: I tried a pair of Under Armour shoes on in the store before I ordered these in a size 8 and they fit fine in the store
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever ordered shoes off line. I tried a pair of Under Armour shoes on in the store before I ordered these in a size 8 and they fit fine in the store, but when I received these in the mail they were small on my feet. So now I am stuck with a pair of shoes that I'm not going to be able to wear! So I would recommend if you ordered these shoes to definitely go up a half a size bigger than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tennis shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my fourth pair of these, and I love them. I have never found a more comfortable shoe! They are light-weight, but still have decent support. I have wider feet, and they are still very comfortable. Great for jogging, or just everyday wear. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: At least to send me a new pair of tennis shoes since I paid for a new pair.  I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed, when I opened my box of my new shoes and noticed that probably someone returned this set of shoes didn’t even bother to put back the inside paper that always comes in with it, and one shoe has glitter inside and the shoes were laced up like when someone tries them on
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Pena

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute but don't have good support. In addition, the tongue is too narrow so you can see part of the top of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: AMCR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit; Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They fit great! I have a high arch and these shoes are perfect. One reason I only buy UnderArmour.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Painful in toe box
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. I will no longer buy shoes through Amazon. Apparently I have returned to many items and they now charge my prime account for returns. I can't risk it with shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Baas

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these UA shoes. Super comfy. I run about 5 miles at a time 5x a week and these hold up fantastic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tech2

customer_reviews.title: On my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve actually bought two pairs now. Love them. So comfortable and fit great. I have wider feet and don’t have any problems with my toes rubbing or blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for summer sneakers for camp cadet. I wear a women's size 9 wide so I was worried. I wore the sneakers for twelve hours a day. They were the best! Instead of buying a 9, I bought a 9.5. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an old pair of sneakers. They fit true to size and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cote

customer_reviews.title: Good support, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really really like these shoes. The only reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because they do seem to wear down/wear out fast and need to be replaced regularly. Good support, good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: ... day and have plantar fasciitis and these are so good for heel support
customer_reviews.text: I stand on concrete all day and have plantar fasciitis and these are so good for heel support
customer_reviews.author: sherry emerson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SNEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my mom as a present and she loved them. The color and the fit are perfect. Item arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Denn

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd pair of these shoes, 1st pair ordering from Amazon but same great shoe and cheaper than I found in store! would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to start with
customer_reviews.text: Have had lots of these pairs of shoes. Soft to start with. And they last pretty long - roughly 3-4 months with constant use. I wear them for work walking around in a Warehouse and my feet feel good while i'm there! First time getting them from Amazon and I was pleasantly surprised to see that they were cheaper than where I'd gotten them previously. Definitely worth mine and your time!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have been great my daughter has almost grown out of them and we will probably get another pair in the next size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dingledine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. Different brands usually wearing 6 1/2 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Different brands usually wearing 6 1/2 but I read all the reviews so ordered 7 perfect... I had already 5 pairs different UA and I love it...
customer_reviews.author: AdligHays

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little narrow - but great other than that
customer_reviews.text: I love this show from UA. It is running a little bit narrower than the others I have purchased. But even with that I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: MonaB

customer_reviews.title: I love how these shoes look on and off
customer_reviews.text: I love how these shoes look on and off, but I ordered a half size bigger than normal and they were snug
customer_reviews.author: Sailors wife

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: They get wet easily in rain, but are very comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Krasco

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches & these shoes fit so perfect. I wear them to Disney & Walk 10ksteps - no foot discomfort. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stef L

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had my size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. Liked them so much I wanted them for myself too but couldn't find my size.... yay for Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay K.

customer_reviews.title: I have these in a different color but like this color better
customer_reviews.text: I have these in a different color but like this color better. They fit great and hardly need to be broken in. The price was good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toes feel crowded!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, however there is not much room for comfort across the toes. Wore them on a 5 mile walk & the side of my foot was red. Hoping they only need to be broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Strawderman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable. It looks good. My feet feel great in them.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable for working all day in them as well as going for a run
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit well in my narrow heel, have a little arch support, and are slightly wide in the toe box.The shoe breathes and stay cool. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eller

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I could not find these shoes anywhere, my old pair wore out, so glad to get them.
customer_reviews.author: shelia4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable shoes at a great price. Fit perfect to the size.
customer_reviews.author: MIHAELA SOVEA Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Runs Slightly Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute and comfortable. Make sure to order 1/2 size up. I usually wear a 7.5, the 8 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this purchase. I workout a lot and these fit perfect. I’m a 8 1/2 medium. They are sooooo comfortable! Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: armigirl

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They’re so comfortable. Under Armour is my favorite brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable!! Fit great. I wear women's 9 & these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: djm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I was able to wear these shoes right out of the box without blisters or pain!
customer_reviews.author: Cgill

customer_reviews.title: No need to ‘break’ in!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and comfortable and breathable! Im on my feet all day and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: samantha stone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever had. I walk 2-3 miles daily and these work great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat a quality brand shoe for only $35! Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little smaller I am an 8 I should have got 8.5
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes. I like them even better than the pic
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its comfortable and snug to my feet. Im pretty please with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Nice

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Support
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a great fit! They provide the support that me feet really need while on the treadmill. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great, feel great, and the sizing was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: _anon

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes. I ordered my size and it fit as expected. The show is wide enough for me. I have wide feet. I will order another pair, plus the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stouffer

customer_reviews.title: Dry comfy and fit true to size on my wide ...
customer_reviews.text: Dry comfy and fit true to size on my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Astaton1982

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit and look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Mom loves them. According to her very well made, perfect fit and look great. Previously had New Balance which did not wear well after less than year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for running
customer_reviews.text: My feet do not get hot anymore. I love these showes and recomend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter for school and she loves them. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and these fit perfect! Very comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She has worn them everyday, and sometimes when she sleeps! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R Burkeen

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for look and style. I love them they are comfortable and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Lover!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I didn’t find them made small as some reviews stated. My normal size is what I ordered and they are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with good support.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for 12 hours the first time and they were very comfortable. They have good support which as a nurse is definitely needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: UNDER ARMOUR - WOEMEN'S Dash Rn 2 Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are beautifully designed, well made, very comfortable - from the first time I wore them. and I get a lot of complement!
customer_reviews.author: Nomi N Roisman

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! They are comfortable and fit just right
customer_reviews.text: I spend my nights walking on cement for work. These shoes are amazing! They are comfortable and fit just right. I ordered another pair to run in, and they got just the same. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes, but, they ran small. My toes hit the end of the shoe. I sold them to a coworker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Made To Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my wife, lasted maybe 2 weeks and the front part of the sole started to peel off. Was not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ryan Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but the tongue on the shoe is narrow and shows part of my sock on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper74

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes. Fit as expected and was delivered in a reasonable time
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, so comfortable no need to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Department

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are a little more narrow than expected in ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a little more narrow than expected in the widest part of my toes. I believe a little shoe stretch will do the trick though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product!!! It was true to the size. I have bought a total of 3 pairs so far!
customer_reviews.author: Neek

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour in my size.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I could find Under Armour shoes in my size. Delivery was very fast. These shoes look great & are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ... in the width than I expected but a very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter in the width than I expected but a very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K. Coyle

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. However I have a high arch and they don't really give me the support I should have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shop Amazon R
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! I purchased them at a great price 👍 Had alot of complements and where did you get them.
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Style & Function, Lots of Compliments. Walked 3 miles, all smiles.
customer_reviews.author: MReid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep so I just don't lace them tight.
customer_reviews.author: rideandcook

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for my feet
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes, but I cant run in them. They hurt the arches of my feet when running, so I just wear them for everyday stuff. They fit really well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Campeau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors but definitely buy a half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, very comfortable fit. I'm very satisfied with the shoes so far👍
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: Not what i ordered!
customer_reviews.text: It is not what i ordered! I ordered under armour shoes n i got crocs
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I am a little bit disappointed but I can get it here in Sioux Falls
customer_reviews.text: Thank you amazon for cancelling my pepper spray and motion sensor orders. I am a little bit disappointed but I can get it here in Sioux Falls. By the way, the Under Armor shoes is really nice and comfy. I use it everyday when I go to work,I am really satisfied with the product; It fits me right and I wanted to buy more but I am skeptical, I am afraid you will cancel it again. It's so nice that makes my co workers jealous...I highly recommend this product to them. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jolyn

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Speedform Slingwrap Fade Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Stitched leather & mesh upper delivers breathable support. EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort. One-piece EVA foam midsole for a lightweight, responsive ride. Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Offset: 10 mm. Weight: 7.5 oz.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Stitched leather & mesh upper delivers breathable support
EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort
